_aChangeLog.text: Improved bot's movement through all stairways
Improved bot's movement through a dangerous and difficult areas (Downstairs - Upstairs)

_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_STEALTH

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: July 15 2016

Here is the Navigation Mesh for high-detailed military/warehouse themed map de_stealth by NvC_DmN_CH (created July 2016). It's created from scratch and manually optimized (hand-tuned) .nav-file ('cause original mapauthor's release was not included .nav-file).

Well... bots use all possible ways now. And they are interested very much about a railway transport and rocket technologies! :-)

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

NOTE: The most important and insuperable issue - when T-bots drop the bomb to a rocket silo then they die trying to get her from there. But it's a question of bot-psychology instead the nav-making! :D

Play and Enjoy! Also always will be grateful for your remarks and feedbacks ;-)

Credits and Gratitudes:  NvC_DmN_CH (for very realistic and fight-friendly atmospheric underground-styled map).

Additional Gratitudes:  BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),  Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),  CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),  Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Countdown has ceased, power level is nil, the light is green for immediate overkill :-)
